title: EU Climate Tariff CBAM Enrages German Businesses – Stainless Espresso - Gerber Steel GmbH
author: Gerber Group
text: 6 October 2023 – Medium-sized companies in Germany are angrily up in arms against the EU climate tariff CBAM. Because neither the responsibilities have been clarified, nor is there a functioning system and it is becoming increasingly clear that the EC has simply ignored or simply suppressed all warnings about CBAM. Source
